text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Ana nkuiona uli najiwaga (Qur’aniji) jakutyochela kwa Allah, sano jenumanja ni n’jikaanile, sano nkutendela umboni jwakuumila mu wanache wa Israila (Abdullah bin Salam t) ni jutendele umboni pa jalakweji (kuti jakuona mpela mujawelele Taurat), ni jukulupilile, sano jenumanja ni n’dikwesyisye (pangajikulupilila, ana ngam’ba walupuso?)” Chisimu Allah jwaangaajongola wandu walupuso
